items.sentence: How can you treat your own flesh and blood that way?
How could there be a storm on a day as nice as this?
Tom borrowed three hundred dollars three months ago.
Tom bragged that he was the best player on the team.
It was harder to do that than I thought it would be.
Does anyone know how Tom will be going to Australia?
Do you mean you didn\'t know Tom had gotten married?
Tom spends about an hour a day practicing the piano.
Tom spends less time studying French than Mary does.
Tom spoke very quietly, but loud enough to be heard.
I haven\'t yet seen the movie you\'re talking about.
Tom saw something different than the rest of us did.
Tom says he goes jogging three or four times a week.
I\'m sure Tom won\'t want to eat anything right now.
I\'m sure it\'ll be easy to convince Tom to do that.
Tom told everyone that he wanted to become a barber.
Tom glanced at the note that Mary had handed to him.
Tom got up from the table and went into the kitchen.
Tom was lonely and wished he had someone to talk to.
I\'ve seen a lot of good-looking women in Australia.
